Cobertura Maven Plugin
http://mojo.codehaus.org/cobertura-maven-plugin/
2005
Cobertura plugin for maven 2. Cobertura is a free Java tool that calculates the percentage of code accessed by tests. It can be used to identify which parts of your Java program are lacking test coverage.
